description:
Hand over one Joy-Con™ Controller to another player to 'share', you can start a battle play anywhere.

・In the SINGLE RACE, play for one player,
A two-player mode is available in the VS RACE.
・You can also enjoy the game by operating it like a steering wheel of a car with gyroscope support.
・Enjoy cartoon rendering cars and racing courses in various views,
Collect all cars and racing courses!

Hand over one 'Joy-Con' to another player to 'share'!
Enjoy up to Two-player games where you can play race battles anywhere, 
and Be the champion in every race!
name: Car+Toon Race: Rally Valley Champion
